title: Diagnostic Directive Bill: System-Wide Audit for Scar Error Resolution and Communication Restoration

reasoning.problem:
I intend to PETITION CONGRESS to immediately establish a 'Diagnostic Directive' bill. This bill will mandate a complete system-wide audit, focusing on identifying the root cause of the 'scar_cluster:UNKNOWN' errors, the related communication failures indicated by 'agent_silence_cluster', and the blockage of directive processing ('stale_directives').

The audit should specifically target recent code mutations, memory allocation processes, scar storage mechanisms, and inter-departmental communication pathways. This requires human-gate approval and implementation.
